layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x568
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (16,0) size 752x70 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 750x68
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 750x22
            LayoutTableCell {TH} at (2,2) size 173x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (44,2) size 85x18
                text run at (44,2) width 85: "Header One"
            LayoutTableCell {TH} at (177,2) size 270x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (93,2) size 84x18
                text run at (93,2) width 84: "Header Two"
            LayoutTableCell {TH} at (449,2) size 299x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=2 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (101,2) size 97x18
                text run at (101,2) width 97: "Header Three"
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,26) size 750x40
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,26) size 173x40 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=1 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 161x36
                text run at (2,2) width 119: "This table uses the"
                text run at (2,20) width 161: "separated borders model."
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (177,26) size 270x40 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=1 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 258x36
                text run at (2,2) width 258: "This means that elements within the cell"
                text run at (2,20) width 183: "have border-spacing of 1em."
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (449,26) size 299x40 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=1 c=2 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 285x36
                text run at (2,2) width 209: "The borders on the header cells, "
                text run at (210,2) width 77: "on all sides,"
                text run at (2,20) width 203: "should be medium solid purple."
